title: Pad Troubleshooting for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This video shows how to solve pad issues for your iRobot® Braava jet™. To check if there is a problem with your Braava jet™ cleaning pad, turn off the robot by holding down the clean button. Remove the pad, and wipe the underside of the robot with a clean, dry cloth. Now, rotate the pad and reinstall. Restart the robot by pressing the clean button twice.

asset.title: Pad Troubleshooting for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This video shows how to solve pad issues for your iRobot® Braava jet™. To check if there is a problem with your Braava jet™ cleaning pad, turn off the robot by holding down the clean button. Remove the pad, and wipe the underside of the robot with a clean, dry cloth. Now, rotate the pad and reinstall. Restart the robot by pressing the clean button twice.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: To check if there's a problem with your Braava jet cleaning pad, turn off the robot by holding down the clean button. Remove the pad and wipe the underside of the robot with a clean dry cloth. Now, rotate the pad and reinstall. Restart the robot by pressing the clean button twice.
